page.title: 16WORSHIP IN WOOBURN GREEN
page.content: There are 2 Churches of England,1 United Reform and 1 Methodist.Hedsor is flint built,on the remains of a Roman temple,dedicated to St Nicholas.The first water pump organ in the world was here.No headstones allowed in the grave yard.One service each Sunday,30 attend. St Paul's Church,stone and flint,with a 15 century tower by John Goodwin.People have worshipped here for 805 yrs.Each Sunday 3 services held.Contains many excellent brasses.Georgian silver of great value now kept in the bank,since recent robberies.Congregation of 80. United Reform Church built 19 century, has a congregation of 98.The Methodist Church built in the 19 century has a congregation of 50.Each church has a full time cleric.
